Summary: I felt a strong vibration in the air and distant. I looked out the window and saw the UFO which suddenly changed direction and disappeared in front of my eyes.
divs: Sighting Details1 - In Home, in my Bedroom. 2 - 'cause I felt a strong vibration in the air and distant than I looked out the window and saw the UFO. 3 - An airplane. 4 - The UFO changed of direction faster... 5 - I felt a strong vibration in the air and distant. 6 - The UFO has changed direction and disappeared in front of my eyes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Porto Alegre
